pages.text: Ropes are a replacement for ladders, a decoration, or used to grow grapes. Whether one places rope horizontally or vertically, they require an anchor from a solid block. Extend vertical runs of rope by placing more rope to the run. This allows one to create long runs of vertical rope easily.
Tie the rope around a Crop Stake to support the growth of grapes. Be careful as a shooting arrow easily breaks rope.
